parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates [[Post process effects]] specified by effect name and priority. Supported effects are:<br>

* [[Post_process_effects#RadialBlur|"RadialBlur"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ChromAberration|"ChromAberration"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#WetDistortion|"WetDistortion"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ColorCorrections|"ColorCorrections"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#DynamicBlur|"DynamicBlur"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#FilmGrain|"FilmGrain"]]
* [[Post_process_effects#ColorInversion|"ColorInversion"]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ppEffectCreate''' [name, priority]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [name, priority]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of effect type.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> priority: [[Number]] - unique priority, defines order of applying effect to the scene. If there is another effect using the same priority, creation will fail.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - handle or -1 if failed

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''ppEffectCreate''' [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[name1, priority1],...]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [name1, priority1]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of effect type.
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> priority: [[Number]] - unique priority, defines order of applying effect to the scene. If there is another effect using the same priority, creation will fail.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Number]]s [handle1, ...] or [[Nothing]] if failed

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ppGrain = [[ppEffectCreate]] ["filmGrain", 2005];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectEnable]], [[ppEffectEnabled]], [[ppEffectDestroy]], [[ppEffectCommit]], [[ppEffectCommitted]], [[ppEffectAdjust]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>For some examples, check [http://forums.bistudio.com/showthread.php?t=75528 this topic] - [[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
